name: Pokedex
description:
A library of pokemon that you have caught.
      You're able to create, update, and delete(release) pokemon in your pokedex!

en-US.name: Pokedex
en-US.subtitle:
Keep all the pokemon that you caught in your pokedex!
      Update  your pokemon's name or release them badk in the wild!
